docs.lead_paragraph: "It is ironic that the only veteran in the race is going to be denied a voice the day before Veterans Day. In the end, the biggest loser tonight is the American people and the Republican presidential primary process that has been hijacked by news outlets." — Christian Ferry, campaign manager for Lindsey Graham, after the South Carolina senator was cut from next week's Republican presidential debate.

docs.lead_paragraph: The deficit fetishism that led to government cutbacks has been more destructive in the long run than even its critics anticipated.
docs.snippet: The deficit fetishism that led to government cutbacks has been more destructive in the long run than even its critics anticipated....
docs.abstract: Paul Krugman Op-Ed column points to growing evidence that turn toward austerity policies in midst of economic recession has wrought more destruction than some analysts warned, hampering long-term growth; argues policies enacted in name of fiscal responsibility are likely to worsen debt they sought to reduce; questions whether proponents of austerity will learn from mistakes in era where few are willing to admit them.
